resources.string: The OTP you entered is incorrect.
An internal error occurred while processing your request. Please try again in a few minutes.
An unknown error occurred while processing your request.
An unknown error occurred while processing your request.
You cancelled the device provisioning. Please click the button to start again.
How safe is the FluentBuild app?

Fluentbuild is completely secure. Your personal data or information is not shared with Fluentbuild or any of the tests run on your device.

We are built on top of a very secured Android container model that has been developed over several years.

Each app publisher is verified and can be trusted.

You are totally safe.
It is completely free. You just need an Android phone (this one), an internet connection, and some battery juice.\n\nThat\'s all the requirements.

This varies for different test cases, what device you have and country.

After you are signed in, the amount you make for each minute is shown on the home screen.

You can get more information on our pricing page.
Will this cause me to replace my device frequently?

We measure data from various sensors on your device. We will never attempt to run jobs on your device if we determine it is not safe to do so.\n\nFrom our research, device life span is not adversely affected from running jobs. We have several devices that have been running perfectly for over 3 years.
Enable job scheduling to automatically run jobs at specific intervals and earn more money.
